law.text: The Unit of Civil Air Patrol established pursuant to KRS 36.230 shall perform emergency disaster work within the Commonwealth in all instances in which aeronautical equipment and maneuvers might be of assistance in relieving the disaster, and shall engage in all manner of air search and rescue for which the Civil Air Patrol is fitted. The head may establish facilities for aeronautical education and training.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 258, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
